text.div:
DereferenceProviderQuery

QUERY: DereferenceProviderQuery

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/ca-bc/provider/OperationDefinition/bc-dereference-provider-query

URL: [base]/Practitioner/$dereference

URL: [base]/Practitioner/[id]/$dereference

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INsurname0..1string
(string)

Search for providers with the specified surname.

INgiven0..1string
(string)

Search for providers with the specified given name.

INstatus0..1string
(token)

Search for providers with a license that has the specified status.

INaddress-city0..1string
(string)

Search for providers with an address that includes the given city.

INgender0..1string
(token)

Search for providers with the specified gender.

INrole0..1string
(token)

Search for providers that have an associated PractitionerRole code with the specified value.

INlanguage0..1string
(token)

Search for providers who can communicate with the specified language code.

INexpertise0..1string
(token)

Search for providers with a qualification that matches the specified expertise.

INstatus-reason0..1string
(token)

Search for providers with a license that has the specified status reason.

INorganization-name0..1string
(string)

Search for providers associated with an organization with the specified name.

parameter.name: surname
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with the specified surname.

parameter.name: given
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with the specified given name.

parameter.name: status
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with a license that has the specified status.

parameter.name: address-city
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with an address that includes the given city.

parameter.name: gender
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with the specified gender.

parameter.name: role
parameter.documentation: Search for providers that have an associated PractitionerRole code with the specified value.

parameter.name: language
parameter.documentation: Search for providers who can communicate with the specified language code.

parameter.name: expertise
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with a qualification that matches the specified expertise.

parameter.name: status-reason
parameter.documentation: Search for providers with a license that has the specified status reason.

parameter.name: organization-name
parameter.documentation: Search for providers associated with an organization with the specified name.
